home.subtitle: Your Web Digital Marketing and Content Creator

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm Elis, a Diploma student in Digital Media Communication Technology (MC112) at UiTM Alor Gajah, Melaka. I specialize in social media marketing, content creation, and digital strategy.
about.diploma: Diploma in Digital Media Communication Technology
about.hobbyText: Outside of my digital work, I enjoy baking. It has taught me creativity, patience, and attention to detail.
about.work1: Assistant Teacher  TASKA BONDA MAMA MUTIARA HATI (2024)
about.work2: Sales Assistant  KEDAI MAKAN CHE YAH (2023)
about.extra1: JPB, EXCO of Arts & Culture – UiTM Alor Gajah (2024)

quote.line1: Throughout my journey in digital media and marketing, I have contributed to
quote.line2: various creative and promotional projects. Each experience has strengthened
quote.line3: my skills in content creation, branding, and social media strategy
